welcome_message_body: Welcome to Ternate, a city known for its rich history, stunning natural beauty, and warm hospitality. We hope you enjoy your time here and take the opportunity to explore everything this charming city has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!

restaurants.name: Lolo Claro's Restaurant
restaurants.description: Lolo Claro's Restaurant is a asian restaurant located in Lungsod ng Kabite.

restaurants.name: Mountain Brew
restaurants.description: Mountain Brew is a café located in the city.

restaurants.name: Elizabeth Garden Restaurant
restaurants.description: Elizabeth Garden Restaurant is a filipino restaurant located in Maragondon.

restaurants.name: Honorio’s
restaurants.description: Honorio’s is a restaurant located in Maragondon.

restaurants.name: McDonald's
restaurants.description: McDonald's is a fast food restaurant located in Lungsod ng Kabite.
restaurants.address: Ibayo Silangan (Naic), 4100 Lungsod ng Kabite, Cavite

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Babullah Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
